channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

item.title: House to vote on renewing ACA subsidies as a potential deal takes shape in the Senate

item.title: An Oval Office Viewing
item.description: During an interview with our reporters, President Trump discussed a video of an ICE agent fatally shooting a woman in Minneapolis.

item.title: 5 women's health myths, debunked by doctors
item.description: Some common misconceptions keep women from taking optimal care of their health. Here, doctors set the record straight.

item.title: We Pressed Trump on His Conclusion About the ICE Shooting in Minneapolis. Here’s What He Said.
item.description: The exchange was a glimpse into the president’s reflexive defense of his federal crackdown on immigration.
